text: Crown Magnetar will unleash their new EP Punishment via Unique Leader Records on March 7. You can get your entire body melted into your surroundings below via the single "Bringer of Dead Light". The EP was once again produced by producer-turned-bassist Mike Sahm, and features the previously-released single "Decapitation Ritual". Pre-orders for Punishment are available here. Crown Magnetar will also hit the road with headliners Traitors and fellow support act Yosemite In Black this March. html:
Crown Magnetar will unleash their new EP Punishment via Unique Leader Records on March 7. You can get your entire body melted into your surroundings below via the single "Bringer of Dead Light". The EP was once again produced by producer-turned-bassist Mike Sahm, and features the previously-released single "Decapitation Ritual".

Pre-orders for Punishment are available here. Crown Magnetar will also hit the road with headliners Traitors and fellow support act Yosemite In Black this March. Tickets are available here.
